titleInfo.title: Col. Fullers survey of Red River : letter from the Secretary of War, transmitting report and maps of Col. Fullers survey of Red River

mods.note: Caption title; At head of title: 33d Congress, 2d session. House of Representatives. Ex. doc. no. 90; March 3, 1855. Laid upon the table and ordered to be printed; Report signed: Charles A. Fuller, U. S. agent and engineer. The same report was also submitted to the U.S. Senate in a separate document dated February 24, 1855; Librarys LLMVC copy is not accompanied by maps.

titleInfo.title: LSU Libraries Louisiana Waterways Management Collection
